name: Tap Tap Blocks
storyline: You need escape from the opponent locks in order make a high-score and challenge your friends
summary: Tap Tap Blocks is a fun game which is most addictive android game The game play goes like this you need to tap on left and right side of the screen in order to escape from opponent blocks .one who wants to have a best time pass game in your journey or at some leisure time you want to take your mobile in your hand and just searching for a nice time pass game . Then Tap Tap Blocks will be a right option.
